alert.note: Alert for Southern Middlesex; Southern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued March 13 at 5:17PM EDT until March 14 at 6:00AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM EDT TUESDAY THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...Southern Middlesex and Southern New London Counties. * WHEN...From 2 AM EDT Tuesday through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Brief minor flooding of the more vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. THAMES RIVER AT NEW LONDON CT MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 5.1 FT, MODERATE 6.1 FT, MAJOR 7.9 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 2.0 FT, MODERATE 3.0 FT, MAJOR 4.8 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 14/03 AM 4.9/ 5.4 1.8/ 2.2 2.2/ 2.7 2-3 MINOR 14/03 PM 3.5/ 4.0 0.4/ 0.9 1.6/ 2.0 2 NONE 15/04 AM 3.7/ 4.2 0.6/ 1.1 1.1/ 1.6 3 NONE 15/05 PM 3.2/ 3.7 0.1/ 0.6 1.3/ 1.8 3 NONE 16/05 AM 4.0/ 4.5 1.0/ 1.5 1.4/ 1.9 2 NONE &&
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
